body:
Comment 21: 
Sorry for dropping the ball on this 1 year ago.  Do you still see this problem today?  I
still have never seen the problem myself and I have no explanation for why you have. 
According to the gdb backtrace the program is crashing during initialization.  I don't
know why that would be affected by the use of -flto.  The relevant code is all inside
libgo.so.  It hasn't even gotten to your main function at that point.
_Owner changed to @ianlancetaylor._
